name: Wave Teaches Typing
description:
If the game does not load, please try refreshing the page, or using a different browser.

Use your typing skills to keep the wave alive!

Type each letter as the wave passes it to hold up that sign. Time it right for the most points! Can you beat all 5 levels?

Controls

Menu: Use the mouse to select a level

Gameplay: Use they keyboard to type each letter at the right time
